topics.body:
Today's randomly generated scenario...!

A man's empty wallet was given life after the Titanic sank into the ocean, starting the global tectonic rifts that created earthquakes, which in turn came out a fish with legs that had lived underground for centuries and invaded every country except China and now, the wallet must venture off into the Sunset to find the mystical Dildo of Mahogany in order to vanquish the evil fish with legs from resurrecting their lord, Applejack.
